items.name: Firefox, Mozilla
items.description: Get the browser that puts your privacy first — and always has; Seriously private browsing. Firefox automatically blocks 2000+ online trackers from collecting information about what you do online.
items.mydescription: Firefox is a good private browser that I use.

items.name: Firefox Developer Edition, Mozilla
items.description: Welcome to your new favorite browser. Get the latest features, fast performance, and the development tools you need to build for the open web.
items.mydescription: The best browser for web devs.

items.name: Killer Bunnies, Jeffrey Neil Bellinger
items.description: Killer Bunnies is a fun, light-hearted game of social interaction which is great to share with both family and friends. Created in 1989 by Jeffrey Neil Bellinger and illustrated by Jonathan Young, Killer Bunnies is a comical journey through pop-culture. With easy game mechanics and additional twists and turns in each booster deck, there’s a Killer Bunnies adventure that’s right for you!
items.mydescription: A very fun card game that is like a collectible card game like Pokemon or Yu-gi-oh!, but is not collectible. (I played the quest version.)
